name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-personal-sso-quickstart-csharp_dotnetcore
title: Starter solution: Personal tab with SSO  in C#
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to implement SSO authentication in a personal Teams tab using Azure Microsoft Entra and C#.
longDescription: This comprehensive sample illustrates how to implement SSO authentication for personal tabs in Microsoft Teams using Azure Microsoft Entra and C#. It includes setup instructions, integration with MSAL.js 2.0, Graph API usage, and guidance for running the app in local and production environments.
